t: Amazon.com: Sennelier Dry Pigment, 180g, Azure Blue Hue
s: I love this brand. Their colors are rich and the quantities are generous. I trust Sennelier. ... I'd buy this again. The container was filled to the top. I'm using it for touch up spots on Watercolor paintings and it would take me 3 life times to use all of this! So worth the money! ... This cerulean blue pigment is so stunning and velvety. It mixed beautifully with binder to make the prettiest watercolor paint. ... I purchased the Cadmium Yellow Hue ...
